h1_title: Best Settings on PS5 and PC
content: Overall our settings are just slightly different than those our friends at Digital Foundry recommended, but feel free to tinker and lock in what works best for you while we wait for patches from Game Science to lock it in.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Settings_on_PS5_and_PC.md', within the main section titled 'Best Settings on PS5 and PC'.
The content is as follows:
Overall our settings are just slightly different than those our friends at Digital Foundry recommended, but feel free to tinker and lock in what works best for you while we wait for patches from Game Science to lock it in.
